participant_1.background:
I live in Manhattan with my wife and two kids.
I get to spend lots of time playing and laughing with my kids.
i have bowled a 300 game twice in my life.
until recently i have never been able to sing in front of anyone.
I often take my kids out to dinner to remind me of my childhood.

participant_2.background:
I am grateful that my job provides me with the flexibility to be there for my son when he needs me.
I am a single, child-free professional who enjoys flying model airplanes and eating gummy bears.
my favorite book is enders game.
I was a park ranger for many years before I started my current job.
every fall i visit my sister in canada.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
Hello! I am doing well, thank you for asking. How are you?
I am doing well, thank you. I am a father of two and I live in Manhattan. Do you have any children?
I am a single child-free professional. I enjoy my job which provides me with the flexibility to be there for my son when he needs me.
That's great that you are able to have a flexible job. I love spending time with my kids. I often take them out to dinner to remind me of my childhood.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I enjoy flying model airplanes and eating gummy bears.
Sounds like you have some fun hobbies. My favorite book is Ender's Game.
I love Ender's Game too! I was a park ranger for many years before I started my current job.
That's really cool! Where did you work as a park ranger?
I worked in a variety of national parks, including Yellowstone and Yosemite.
Wow, that must have been amazing. I've always wanted to visit Yellowstone.
It was an amazing experience. I would highly recommend it.
I will have to put that on my bucket list. Thanks for the recommendation.
